name: Wideo, Inc.
description: Developer of an online animated video creation platform designed to empower people to create professional online videos. The company's platform provides flexibility beyond templates and themes and offers a selection of templates that can be customized to deliver a message or create one from scratch, enabling users to create, edit and share unique professional videos in order to elevate their online marketing strategy faster and easier.
one_liner: Developer of an online animated video creation platform designed to empower people to create professional online videos. The company's platform provides flexibility beyond templates and themes and offers a selection of templates that can be customized to deliver a message or create one from scratch, enabling users to create, edit and share unique professional videos in order to elevate their online marketing strategy faster and easier.
